abstract: Python3 scripts for periodically cleaning data synchronized by data providers towards the European HFR Node (EU HFR Node).
description: Python3 scripts for periodically cleaning data synchronized by data providers towards the European HFR Node (EU HFR Node). Tool to be run at the EU HFR Node. The applications are designed for High Frequency Radar (HFR) data management according to the European HFR node processing workflow. Data older than 30 days are removed from the providers' home folders on the access virtual machine.

name: EU_HFR_NODE_accessCleanSynchedData
